trans-unit.source: Asynchronously encrypts a single block of data.
trans-unit.target: Asynchronously encrypts a single block of data.

trans-unit.source: The amount of data that may be encrypted is determined by the target key type and the encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: The amount of data that may be encrypted is determined by the target key type and the encryption algorithm.

trans-unit.source: The application, rather than the server application, that initiates a connection to a server.
trans-unit.target: The application, rather than the server application, that initiates a connection to a server.

trans-unit.source: The key bundle to use for encryption.
trans-unit.target: The key bundle to use for encryption.

trans-unit.source: For more information on possible algorithm types, see <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.WebKey.JsonWebKeyEncryptionAlgorithm</codeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on possible algorithm types, see <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.WebKey.JsonWebKeyEncryptionAlgorithm</codeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: A single block of data to encrypt.
trans-unit.target: A single block of data to encrypt.
